creator: priyananth@gmail.com
text:
Hi, 

I am getting '#' character in my PDF. 
I hope this is because of glyph char is not there or is it a bug?
If it is a bug how can change the '#' symbol to some other character  (for user to lookin)

creator: max@berger.name
text:
Dear Arjun,

you will find in the log output that the characters you requested is not available in the font you requested, and therefore a '#' symbol is used, so this is not a bug.

There is currently no option to change the '#' character. If you really need this option, feel free to re-open this bug and rename it to 'wish: set character for missing glyph'
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
